/*
 * Semantic errors & warnings
 * uncomment one block at a time to see what errors are generated by the different passes
 * (if one pass causes an error, the next passes won't get ran)
 */


// 1) un-typed semantics
int foo;
foo=foo;    // (warning) usage of uninitialised variable
int a = &10;    // address of r-val
int a = 5;    // re-declaration
b = 'a';    // undeclared


/*
// 2) type assignment errors
int a = 0.3;    // (warning) implicit conversion
a = *10;    // de-referencing non-ptr
char b = 'a';
a = b;
*/

/*
// 3) typed semantics
const float my_var = 1 + 10.0 / 3;
my_var = 0.2;    // re-assigning to const var
*/
